page.title: 10SHILLINGFORD-SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: THERE HAS LATELY BEEN SOME CONCERN OF THE FARMERS ON PEAMORE COTTAGE FARM (THE M5 MOTORWAY RIGHT THROUGH THE FARM).IT WOULD HAVE BEEN NO FUN TO HAVE A MOTORWAY RUN THROUGH THE FARMERS LAKE,GARDEN AND BE FORTY FEET FROM ONE OF HIS SIDE WINDOWS.HE FOUGHT A GOOD FIGHT WITH THE ROAD COMPANY AND GOVERMENT AND AS A RESULT OF HIS EFFORT THE MOTORWAY IS NOW MORE THAN A MILE AWAY. ALSO MANY FARMERS HAVE BEEN CONCERNED WITH LOW FLYING AIRCRAFT(RAF).IT IS THEIR CONCERN BECAUSE OF THE LIVESTOCK THEY KEEP THAT PROVIDES THEM WITH THEIR LIVELYHOOD AND IF A COW,EWE OR HEN IS ABOUT TO GIVE BIRTH AND PROVIDE THE FARMERS WITH MORE WEALTH YOU CAN SEE THAT HE WOULD'NT BE VERY HAPPY IF A THUNDERING JET WENT OVER THE FARM!
